description: Flexible patterns that work for any oceanographic parameter (temperature, salinity, pressure, oxygen, etc.)

queries.content: show me {parameter} data, get {parameter} measurements, display {parameter} values, {parameter} readings from region, extract {parameter} information, give me {parameter}, show {parameter} measurements, {parameter} data from profiles

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.latitude BETWEEN {lat_min} AND {lat_max} AND p.longitude BETWEEN {lon_min} AND {lon_max} AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: {parameter} range between {min_value} and {max_value}, {parameter} values from {min_value} to {max_value}, {parameter} in range, specific {parameter} values, {parameter} within limits, {parameter} between values, filter {parameter} by range

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.{parameter} BETWEEN {min_value} AND {max_value} ORDER BY m.{parameter} DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: maximum {parameter}, highest {parameter} values, peak {parameter} readings, extreme high {parameter}, {parameter} maximum values, top {parameter} measurements, hottest {parameter}, strongest {parameter}

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.{parameter} DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: minimum {parameter}, lowest {parameter} values, smallest {parameter} readings, extreme low {parameter}, {parameter} minimum values, bottom {parameter} measurements, coldest {parameter}, weakest {parameter}

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.{parameter} ASC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: average {parameter}, mean {parameter} values, {parameter} averages by region, typical {parameter} readings, {parameter} statistics, {parameter} summary statistics, {parameter} means

metadata.sql_template: SELECT AVG(m.{parameter}) as avg_{parameter}, COUNT(m.{parameter}) as data_points, STDDEV(m.{parameter}) as std_dev, MIN(m.{parameter}) as min_val, MAX(m.{parameter}) as max_val FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.latitude BETWEEN {lat_min} AND {lat_max} AND p.longitude BETWEEN {lon_min} AND {lon_max} AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL

queries.content: {parameter} at depth {depth_value}, {parameter} at {depth_value} meters, {parameter} measurements at specific depth, {parameter} values at pressure level, {parameter} at this depth, {parameter} vertical profile

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.pressure BETWEEN {depth_min} AND {depth_max} AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: surface {parameter}, {parameter} at surface, {parameter} at sea surface, top layer {parameter}, {parameter} near surface, surface layer {parameter} measurements

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.{parameter}, m.pressure FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.pressure <= {surface_threshold} AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: deep {parameter}, {parameter} below {depth_threshold}, {parameter} in deep water, {parameter} at depth, deep water {parameter} measurements, {parameter} from deep ocean

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.{parameter} FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.pressure > {depth_threshold} AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.pressure DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: profiles without {parameter}, missing {parameter} data, no {parameter} measurements, {parameter} data gaps, profiles missing {parameter}, incomplete {parameter} data

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_id, p.float_id, p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude FROM profiles p LEFT JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE m.{parameter} IS NULL OR m.{parameter} = '' OR m.{parameter}_qc NOT IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY p.profile_id ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC LIMIT {limit_count}

queries.content: recent {parameter} measurements, latest {parameter} data, newest {parameter} readings, current {parameter} values, {parameter} from last week, fresh {parameter} data

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.{parameter}, p.float_id FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.profile_date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL {days_back} DAY) AND m.{parameter} IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC LIMIT {limit_count}
